    • Uses of ServerCnxn in org.apache.zookeeper.server.auth.znode.groupacl

      Subclasses of ServerCnxn in org.apache.zookeeper.server.auth.znode.groupacl 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ZkClientUriDomainMappingHelper.MappingRootWatcher
      The watcher used to listen on client uri - domain mapping root path for mapping update Extends DumbWatcher instead of ServerCnxn because there are some package-private methods in ServerCnxn which cannot be overridden here, such as abstract void setSessionId(long sessionId);.
      Methods in org.apache.zookeeper.server.auth.znode.groupacl with parameters of type ServerCnxn 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Update the domain-based AuthInfo for the specified connection.
